title: (x) VIKTOR & ROLF logo - Avenir {Sebastian}
content:
what is this typeface?  
i've researched this for hours and can't find the name.  
all i know is that Mevis & Van Deursen we're the two who used it to brand "viktor & rolf".

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202182811im_/http:/typophile.com/files/VR_5600.jpg)
author: renderjones
